text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the State Commission on Kidney Disease.
"Department" means the department responsible for administering the Kidney Disease Program.

section.section: "Liquid assets" includes cash, bank accounts, and investments such as stocks and bonds that can be readily converted to cash.

"Liquid assets" does not include an individual's:
Principal residence; or
Principal car.

text.section: "Recipient" means an individual with chronic kidney disease who has been certified to receive benefits under the Kidney Disease Program.
